CustomField.formula: IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < DATE(2022,05,31), 2021, IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2022,06,01) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2023,01,31), 2022, IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2023,11,01) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < DATE(2024,02,29), 2023, IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2024,06,01) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < DATE(2025,02,28), 2024, IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2025,07,01) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < DATE(2025,07,31), 2025, null)))))
